code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant API as API Gateway
    participant Store1 as Storage Node 1 (Primary)
    participant Store2 as Storage Node 2 (Replica)
    participant Meta as Metadata DB

    Note over API, Store2: Write Request
    API->>Store1: WriteBlob(Data) - Primary
    Store1-->>API: Success (Checksum)
    
    API->>Meta: CreateMetadata(Replica=['Node1'])
    Meta-->>API: Created

    Note over API, Store2: Async Replication
    API-)Store2: ReplicateBlob(Data)
    Store2-->>API: Success
    
    API->>Meta: UpdateMetadata(Replica=['Node1', 'Node2'])
    Meta-->>API: Updated
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
